H0.text: A virus suspended in the air is the condition most likely to spread an illness between people.

H1.text: An accident on a playground is the condition most likely to spread an illness between people.

H2.text: A genetic mutation in somatic cells is the condition most likely to spread an illness between people.

H3.text: An occurrence of acid rain is the condition most likely to spread an illness between people.

A4.text: Airborne transmission or aerosol transmission is transmission of an infectious disease through small particles suspended in the air.
